channel.title: YPcode
channel.description: Experiences and research on Microsoft 365, Azure and modern web development

item.title: Use the CSOM Library in your ASP.NET Core apps
item.description: Recently the support for .NET Standard in the CSOM library was released. It opens up a variety of new possibilities for SharePoint developers. In this post, let's see how we can leverage the CSOM library in a ASP.NET Core web application.
item.creator: Yannick Plenevaux
